es.situm.sdk.v1

Class SitumSearchManager.KeyValueFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.situm.sdk.v1.SitumSearchManager.KeyValueFilter
  • Enclosing class:
    SitumSearchManager

    public static class SitumSearchManager.KeyValueFilter
extends Object
    Helper class used to filter Map objects. You specify what field/s do you want to filter with a SitumSearchManager.KeyValueFilter.FilterBy The regular expression passed as pattern will be used to filter the Map using a Pattern.
